body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0010]/value as T0_tender_joints,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0011]/value as T0_swollen_joints
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.das28_esr.v0]
  )
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
